show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Did Johnson and Johnson knowingly and willingly sell defective hip prostheses? gt; Preventive medicine saves money depending on how it is defined!
Can ADHD and ADD be treated with diet alone?
Is placebo as effective as drugs for kids with migraine?
How can we optimize our kids’ IQ?
